alternative_parents.description: Alkyhalide compounds that are composed only of hydrogen, fluorine, and carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrofluorocarbons

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl fluoride functional group with formula R-F , where R is an alkyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl fluorides

class.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a fluorine atom.
class.name: Organofluorides

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as organofluorides. These are compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a fluorine atom.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a fluorine atom.
direct_parent.name: Organofluorides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and a halogen atom (At, F, Cl, Br, I).
superclass.name: Organohalogen compounds
